article_title: The Battle For A More Competitive Health Care Market Continues

article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo

og.description: The battle to allow for more competition in the health care market wages on between the Davids and Goliaths of the North Carolina health care industry. Last week’s NC House Health Committee meeting featured a debate between the Hospital Association’s deputy general counsel and a lobbyist representing the North Carolina [...]
